title: COMFEE' Mini 2-Slice Toaster Oven, Countertop toaster oven, 2-Knobs Easy to Control with Timer for Bake, Broil, Toast, 1000W, Black/White (CO-B08AA(BK))
description: Comfee’s mini oven is a real space-saver for your kitchen. It fits any kitchen style with its neat and simple design. Smaller does not mean you lose out on power, with the 3-in-1 function you can still enjoy the fun of baking pizza, broiling chicken wings, french fries, or toasting bread with this oven. It is perfect for foodies whose kitchen space is limited. Equipped with 1000W firepower and 2 heating tubes, the countertop toaster oven has a wide range of temperature control (160~450°F) which can offer more cooking possibilities. The 2-knob design control console enables you to control cooking functions (left) and time (right) separately. The timer can be set up to 60 minutes. The lower baking tray will be pulled out a bit when the oven door is open. You can easily take out dishes without getting your hands burned. You won't have to constantly clean this toaster oven small thanks to a crumb tray that catches breadcrumbs and other food. Remove the tray and empty it right away for the next use. This compactable design mini toaster oven fits nicely on any countertop and it is essential equipment to your single apartment or dormitory. And Comfee offers 4-Year Warranty Plus a Lifetime of Customer Support, any problems with your toaster oven will be solved professionally.
